alert.note: Alert for Natrona (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 10 at 3:02PM MDT until September 10 at 3:30PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN NATRONA COUNTY... At 302 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Teapot Rock, which is also 30 miles north of Casper, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Teapot Rock. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 206 and 214. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Very heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
